items.content_html: Crawlyx is an open-source command-line interface (CLI) based web crawler built using Node.js. It is designed to crawl websites and extract useful information like links, images, and text. It is lightweight, fast, and easy to use.

items.content_html: This is an elegant editor for Markdown, a lightweight markup language that allows you to write formatted text using plain text syntax. Markdown is often used to create documentation, readme files, and blog posts.

items.content_html: ZenNote is a lightweight and intuitive note-taking application designed for modern mobile devices. With a clean and minimalist user interface, ZenNote makes it easy to capture and organize your thoughts, ideas, and reminders on the go.
